targets.expression:
fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.cdn!='NA'
|stats sum(event_details.cacheStatus='MISS') as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cacheStatus='HIT') as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.cdn!='NA'
|stats sum(event_details.cacheStatus='MISS') as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cacheStatus='HIT') as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as Global by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display  event_timestamp,Global,'-',cdn

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.initiatorType!='img'
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|filter compression>0
|display event_timestamp,cdn,compression

fields event_details.cdn as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType!='img'
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|filter compression>0

|display event_timestamp,cdn,compression

field concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn,'-',metadata.deviceType) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.initiatorType='navigation'
|stats count() as pageViews by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display event_timestamp,cdn,pageViews

field concat(metadata.deviceType) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation'
|stats count() as pageViews by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display event_timestamp,cdn,pageViews

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
|stats count() as pageViews by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
|display event_timestamp,cdn,pageViews

fields event_details.cdn as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation'
|stats count() as pageViews by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display event_timestamp,cdn,pageViews

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.initiatorType='navigation'
|stats sum(event_details.cacheStatus='MISS') as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cacheStatus='HIT') as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.initiatorType='navigation'
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|filter compression>0
|display event_timestamp,cdn,compression

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,${percentile}) as connectionTime by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
| display event_timestamp,cdn,connectionTime

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='navigation' and event_details.metricType='TTFB' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.value,${percentile}) as ttfb by cdn,bin(1m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp, cdn, ttfb

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and event_details.initiatorType='img'
|stats sum(event_details.cacheStatus='MISS') as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cacheStatus='HIT') as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='img' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,${percentile}) as connectionTime by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
| display event_timestamp,cdn,connectionTime

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and event_details.initiatorType='img' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as ttfb by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp, cdn, ttfb

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and (event_details.initiatorType='script' or event_details.initiatorType='other')
|stats sum(event_details.cacheStatus='MISS') as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cacheStatus='HIT') as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and (event_details.initiatorType='script' or event_details.initiatorType='other')
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|filter compression>0
|display event_timestamp,cdn,compression

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='script' or event_details.initiatorType='other') and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,${percentile}) as connectionTime by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
| display event_timestamp,cdn,connectionTime

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='script' or event_details.initiatorType='other') and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as ttfb by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp, cdn, ttfb

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and (event_details.initiatorType='link')
|stats sum(event_details.cacheStatus='MISS') as cachemiss,sum(event_details.cacheStatus='HIT') as cachehit,cachehit/(cachemiss+cachehit) as chr by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|display  event_timestamp,cdn,chr

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}] and (event_details.initiatorType='link')
|stats avg(event_details.compressRate) as compression by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
|filter compression>0
|display event_timestamp,cdn,compression

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='link') and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.connectionTime,${percentile}) as connectionTime by bin(5m) as event_timestamp,cdn
| display event_timestamp,cdn,connectionTime

fields concat(metadata.countryCode,'-',event_details.cdn) as cdn
|filter event_type='cdn_metrics' and (event_details.initiatorType='link') and metadata.countryCode in [${country:singlequote}]
| stats pct(event_details.requestTime,${percentile}) as ttfb by cdn,bin(5m) as event_timestamp
| display event_timestamp, cdn, ttfb
